question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. table lamp
B. pasta
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The pasta bowl is clearly positioned further back on the table relative to the camera, while the table lamp is closer to the foreground, making the depth relationship obvious without needing a depth map.
